a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Life expectancy of women vs. life expectancy of men, 2021
In countries that lie above the grey line the life expectancy of women is higher than for men.
Data source: United Nations, World Population Prospects (2022)
Note: Shown is the period life expectancy at birth measured in years.
